short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display related IH articles while reading an article on indiehackers.com/post/*

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indiehackers.com is one of my favorite websites.

It has many articles that are motivating and helping many to share, learn and exchange ideas to be a better founder.

This free chrome extension has a simple goal of helping you easily explore related articles, so you can compare notes and hear different experts from different perspectives about the same topic.

It currently only supports articles on indiehackers.com/posts/*.

Any feedback, feel free to DM me on Twitter(@TheLeonWei).
